title: [Question] What is the dress code? (For a Btech fresher)

comments.body: While you technically can, it might look a bit odd in college- although nobody cares enough so wear whatever you want
every Friday is scottish Friday, you need to show up in a [kilt](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2372/3523/files/Studio_035_778x.jpg?v=1739355883)
